message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can have the smaller share this round, but I'll increase it in later rounds if you play along!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off easy!
You're not giving me enough, I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but don't think you're getting a free pass!
You're getting close to my target, but I still need more to make this worth my while!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm not giving up yet! You'll have to do better than that!
I'm starting to get impatient, but I still think I can get a better deal than this!
I'm not backing down, I'm going to make you work for it!
I'm running out of time, but I'm not giving up yet. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you get the better of me, I'm going to make a final stand!
It's now or never, Alice. I'll give you a last chance to make a deal. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
